articles.title: Asia Cup 2022: Shoaib Malik posts cryptic tweet after Pakistan lose final to Sri Lanka - India Today
articles.description: Asia Cup 2022: Out-of-favour all-rounder Shoaib Malik took to Twitter on Sunday to post a cryptic message, taking a jibe at his omission from Asia Cup after Pakistan lost the final to Sri Lanka, failing to chase 171-run target in Dubai.
